content:
These are snowy cantaloupe seeds, I'll give them to you to plant mah~
After you prepare the soil, I-I'll help water them for you!
Let's plant them together, but make sure to wait for me to finish watering, okay mah~?
info: 向云果交付肥料_云果线1

content:
(test) I'll water the field after I finish digging mah~,
Just wait until I'm done watering, okay~!
info: 向云果交付肥料_云果线1

content:
Um, I should let you know that I've returned the fruits to the residents...
The fruits are still in your backpack right now mah~
So, could you please give them to me along with the grass you picked up?
info: 向云果交付肥料_云果线1

content:
Grab your shovel, press T to enter precision farming mode,
Give it a try when digging mah~!
info: 向云果交付肥料_云果线1

content:
(test) O-once everything's ready... 
we'll start digging and sowing! We need to plant four 2x2 plots,
just keep them within the path and fence boundaries, same as before.
